message: I'm having problems with Vim consistently using spaces instead of tabs, even though I've set noexpandtab in my .vimrc. Any ideas on how to fix this?
also, what are your settings for tabstop and shiftwidth?
smarttab isn't on, but smartindent is. Both tabstop and shiftwidth are set to 2.
also, my setup seems to work fine in new documents, but fails in my work's codebase (which is entirely tab-based).
In case anyone was or is curious about this, the problem was Rails.vim
